text: i recently visited this barbecue joint and was blown away by the new ownership the food and service were both excellent and everything was 100 improved i especially loved the lunch specials and the delicious barbecue i cant wait to come back and try more
this quaint little spot is easy to miss if youre not looking for it but i was thrilled to discover it
although its simple to miss this small café due to its unassuming door im glad i happened upon it

i had a philly cheesesteak that was all grilled peppers with no meat and it was overpriced and not very tasty i wont be coming back to that place
visiting the imax is a fantastic experience due to the convenient parking and impressive exhibits however be cautious of the many children present

the chain may not be the best option for barbecue but i find their brisket and pulled pork to be quite satisfying the jalapeno beans are also quite good although i havent tried them yet i was particularly impressed by the appearance of the baby back ribs i also really like the spicy barbecue sauce offered by the chain
chandler residents learn the value of elmers as they grow up in the town its a favorite lunch spot among the community and their bean cheese burros are particularly popular

the establishment where i pay my rent offers services such as shipping printing money orders selling stamps and greeting cards the couple who run the shop are lively and kind but can be a bit brief when answering questions it seems they also offer fax services but its not clear who still uses them today

there has been a decline in the quality of food and service at this establishment in the past they used cashews in their salads but now they have replaced them with peanuts furthermore their food orders are frequently unorganized and inefficient

elmers is a chandler itution that has been a part of my life since childhood as a chandler resident ive come to appreciate the value of their bean cheese burros and cheese strips which is why its a favorite lunch spot among the community the bean cheese burros are particularly popular among chandler residents and the cheese strips are also a delight for us chandler alumni its a cherished tradition to visit elmers after a night out
